headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: identity_type
parameters.description: Identity type. Enum values: CUSTOMIZED_USER , AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT . See Identities for details.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with. Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type. Enum values: CUSTOMIZED_USER , AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT . See Identities for details.

fields.name: identity_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: can_push_video
fields.description: Whether the BC_AUTH_TT or TT_USER identity can create or edit videos. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: can_pull_video
fields.description: Whether the BC_AUTH_TT or TT_USER identity can get all videos under the TikTok account. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: can_use_live_ads
fields.description: Whether the BC_AUTH_TT or TT_USER identity can access the live room. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: can_manage_message
fields.description: Whether the BC_AUTH_TT or TT_USER identity can manage direct messages. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: available_status
fields.description: Availability of the identity. Only valid for TT_USER and BC_AUTH_TT type of identities. Enum values: AVAILABLE , NO_VALID_BIND_ACCOUNT , SCOPE_UNAVAILABLE , IS_PRIVATE_ACCOUNT , NOT_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
